dmca.title: Battle of the Coupon Sites
dmca.body:
Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1    The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.onlinemarts.com

Search Query: "Shop for Bargains & Discounts at Featured Merchants & Online Stores!" and many others.

Infringing Web Site / Pages:
http://www.shoppingcoupons.net - Site wide infringement (143 pages) 
http://www.shoppingcoupons.net/shop/

2.    My Contact Information: [Private]@yahoo.com

3.    Infringer's Contact Information:
Administrative Contact: [Private]
[Private]
[Private]
U.S.
Tel: [Private] Fax: [Private]
Email: [Private]@shoppingcoupons.net
[Private]@shoppingcoupons.net

4.    I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5.    I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[Private]
President/COO
OmniLink International, Inc. 
Phone: [Private]
Fax: [Private]
Email: [Private]@yahoo.com
